author: gartung
body: This uses a python script with networkX to create a class inheritance graph. First all ESD classes are determined from by taking the type of the ESHandle template passed to dm::eventsetup::EventSetupRecord::get(). Next all classes derived from the ESD classes are added to the list. Then all member classes of these classes are added to the list. Finally all classes derived from classes on this list are added.
title: Clang sa update ESD class list generation
